insert into t_car_damage_offer_detail ( id, car_damage_offer_id, car_damage_detail_id, car_damage_id, offer_price, createtime, remark) values
( #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.carDamageOfferId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.carDamageDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.carDamageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.offerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT t_car_damage_offer_detail.id, t_car_damage_offer_detail.car_damage_offer_id, t_car_damage_offer_detail.car_damage_detail_id, t_car_damage_offer_detail.car_damage_id, t_car_damage_offer_detail.offer_price, t_car_damage_offer_detail.createtime, t_car_damage_offer_detail.remark, t_car_part.part_name, t_car_damage_detail.pic, t_car_damage_detail.remark remark1 FROM t_car_damage_offer_detail LEFT JOIN t_car_damage_detail ON t_car_damage_offer_detail.car_damage_detail_id = t_car_damage_detail.id LEFT JOIN t_car_part ON t_car_damage_detail.car_part_id = t_car_part.id left join t_car_damage_offer on t_car_damage_offer.id = t_car_damage_offer_detail.car_damage_offer_id where t_car_damage_offer_detail.car_damage_id = #{param1} and t_car_damage_offer.company_id=#{param2}
